column5: ContextMany metabolic diseases such as obesity, cardio vascular disease, diabetes, cancers are the greatest public health challenges of the 21st century. Their prevalence has increased dramatically in many countries in Europe as well as in Asia, since the 1980s and the number of them continue to rise at an anomaly rate.Food & health are two issues central to human existence and they are inseparable in their relationship meaning « food is medicine » and hold the key to realising a « society in much illness is prevented before it occurs.
